sandbox_mode.label: Sandbox Mode
sandbox_mode.tooltip: The Sandbox mode allows testing without entering a username, password, or DHL Customer Number.

logging_enabled.label: Enable Logging
logging_enabled.comment: Please ensure that the Magento-Log is also activated. Data will be written to dhl_versenden.log.

log_level.label: Log Level
log_level.comment: Beware: Log level Debug will result in large log files.

dhlversenden_fields_account.label: Account Data
dhlversenden_fields_account.comment: Basic account data as required in production mode

account_user.label: User
account_user.tooltip: Username for the DHL Webservice (API). This can be created in the DHL Business Customer Portal.
account_user.comment: Recommendation: Create a System User in the DHL Business Customer Portal.

account_signature.label: Signature
account_signature.tooltip: Password for the DHL Webservice (API). This can be created in the DHL Business Customer Portal.

account_ekp.label: EKP
account_ekp.tooltip: Your DHL Customer Number (Account Number / EKP) from the DHL Business Customer Portal.
account_ekp.comment: See the Knowledge Base tutorial on how to configure the EKP.

account_participation.label: Participation Numbers
account_participation.tooltip: Participation = the last two characters of the accounting number for the referring product
account_participation.comment: See the Knowledge Base tutorial on how to configure the Participation Numbers.

shipment_printonlyifcodeable.label: Print Only If Codeable
shipment_printonlyifcodeable.tooltip: If set to Yes, shipping order requests will only return a label if the DHL delivery address verification succeeds.

shipment_sendreceiverphone.label: Send receiver phone number
shipment_sendreceiverphone.tooltip: If set to Yes, the buyer's phone number will be transmitted to DHL.

shipment_unitofmeasure.label: Weight Unit
shipment_unitofmeasure.tooltip: Select the weight unit that is used in your Product Catalog.

shipment_dhlmethods.label: Shipping Methods for DHL Versenden
shipment_dhlmethods.tooltip: Select shipping methods for rate calculation in checkout.
shipment_dhlmethods.comment: These shipping methods will be processed with DHL Versenden.

shipment_dhlcodmethods.label: Cash On Delivery (COD) Payment Methods for DHL Versenden
shipment_dhlcodmethods.tooltip: These payment methods will be treated as Cash On Delivery (COD) methods during shipping order requests.

service_preferredlocation_enabled.label: Enable Drop-off Location Delivery
service_preferredlocation_enabled.tooltip: Allow customers to declare a preferred parcel location during checkout.

service_preferredneighbour_enabled.label: Enable Neighbor Delivery
service_preferredneighbour_enabled.tooltip: Allow customers to declare a neighbour during checkout.

service_parcelannouncement_enabled.label: Automatic Parcel Announcement
service_parcelannouncement_enabled.tooltip: When service is applied, the buyer's email address will be transmitted to DHL.
service_parcelannouncement_enabled.comment: If you want to enable DHL's Automatic parcel Announcement, please select Enable or Enable on customer choice. Last option gives the customer the choice to request the parcel announcement service by checkbox in the checkout.

service_preferredday_enabled.label: Enable Delivery Day
service_preferredday_enabled.tooltip: Allow customers to select a delivery day.

service_preferredday_handling_fee.label: Additional charge for your delivery day
service_preferredday_handling_fee.tooltip: Insert gross value for surcharge. Insert 0 to offer service for free.

service_preferredday_handling_fee_text.label: Delivery day handling fee text
service_preferredday_handling_fee_text.tooltip: Use $1 as placeholder to insert value and currency in string.

service_cutoff_time.label: Cut off time
service_cutoff_time.tooltip: Cut-off time is the latest possible order time up to which the minimum delivery day (day of order + 2 working days) can be guaranteed. As soon as the time is exceeded, the earliest delivery day displayed in the frontend will be shifted to one day later (day of order + 3 working days).

drop_off_days.label: Days excluded from drop-off
drop_off_days.comment: On the working days checked, there is no transfer of parcels to DHL (in addition to sundays and public holidays). This information influences the first displayed delivery day in the frontend.

shipment_autocreate_enabled.label: Enabled
shipment_autocreate_enabled.tooltip: Create shipments and retrieve labels via cron job.

shipment_autocreate_order_status.label: Order Status
shipment_autocreate_order_status.tooltip: Automatically create shipments for orders in the selected status.

shipment_autocreate_shipping_product.label: Shipping Product (Domestic)
shipment_autocreate_shipping_product.tooltip: Define the domestic default shipping product for automated shipment orders.
shipment_autocreate_shipping_product.comment: Select Merchandise Shipment (Kleinpaket) only if you ship all or most of your orders as Merchandise Shipments. Otherwise, choose National Shipment (Paket National).

shipment_autocreate_service_visualchecko.label: Visual Check of Age
shipment_autocreate_service_visualchecko.tooltip: Book the service Visual Check Of Age with automated shipment orders.

shipment_autocreate_service_returnshipme.label: Return Shipment
shipment_autocreate_service_returnshipme.tooltip: Book the service Return Shipment with automated shipment orders.

shipment_autocreate_service_insurance.label: Additional Insurance
shipment_autocreate_service_insurance.tooltip: Book the service Additional Insurance with automated shipment orders.

shipment_autocreate_service_bulkygoods.label: Bulky Goods
shipment_autocreate_service_bulkygoods.tooltip: Book the service Bulky Goods with automated shipment orders.

shipment_autocreate_service_parceloutlet.label: Parcel Outlet Routing
shipment_autocreate_service_parceloutlet.tooltip: Book the service Parcel Outlet Routing with automated shipment orders.

shipment_autocreate_service_parceloutlet.label: Alternative Email Address
shipment_autocreate_service_parceloutlet.comment: Non-delivery notice will be sent to this email address. If left empty, the customer's email address is used. In this case, you must make sure to obtain data privacy consent from your customers.
shipment_autocreate_service_parceloutlet.tooltip: Enter your email address here if you, as the sender, would like to receive the collection information.

contact_person.label: First Name and Last Name of Contact Person

dhlversenden_fields_bankdata.label: Bank Data
dhlversenden_fields_bankdata.comment: Bank data as required for cash on delivery payments
